name: Movie Streaming Platform
desc: A Netflix-like platform with secure MB Bank payment integration and AI-powered features for personalized recommendations and user assistance. Built using Vue.js and Laravel.

name: RELIEFLINK - Emergency Response System
desc: An open-source project for managing and delivering resources during disaster scenarios, leveraging Appsmith, Docker, MongoDB, and OpenStreetMap. Built for the Vietnam Student Olympiad in Informatics 2024.
